verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> thou goest out <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thine enemies, <S%H341><s%> and seest <S%H7200><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%> and chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and a people <S%H5971><s%> more <S%H7227><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> thou, be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H3808><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them: for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is with <S%H5973><s%> thee, which brought thee up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> when ye are come nigh <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the battle, <S%H4421><s%> that the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall approach <S%H5066><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%>

And shall say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> approach <S%H7131><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> unto battle <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> your enemies: <S%H341><s%> let not <S%H408><s%> your hearts <S%H3824><s%> faint, <S%H7401><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> not, <S%H408><s%> and do not <S%H408><s%> tremble, <S%H2648><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> be ye terrified <S%H6206><s%> because of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them;

For <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is he that goeth <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> you, to fight <S%H3898><s%> for you against <S%H5973><s%> your enemies, <S%H341><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> you.

And the officers <S%H7860><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4310><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is there that <S%H834><s%> hath built <S%H1129><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and hath not <S%H3808><s%> dedicated <S%H2596><s%> it? let him go <S%H1980><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> to his house, <S%H1004><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> he die <S%H4191><s%> in the battle, <S%H4421><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> dedicate <S%H2596><s%> it.

And what <S%H4310><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is he that <S%H834><s%> hath planted <S%H5193><s%> a vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> and hath not <S%H3808><s%> yet eaten <S%H2490><s%> of it? let him also go <S%H1980><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> unto his house, <S%H1004><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> he die <S%H4191><s%> in the battle, <S%H4421><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> eat <S%H2490><s%> of it.

And what <S%H4310><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is there that <S%H834><s%> hath betrothed <S%H781><s%> a wife, <S%H802><s%> and hath not <S%H3808><s%> taken <S%H3947><s%> her? let him go <S%H1980><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> unto his house, <S%H1004><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> he die <S%H4191><s%> in the battle, <S%H4421><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> her.

And the officers <S%H7860><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> further <S%H3254><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they shall say, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4310><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is there that is fearful <S%H3373><s%> and fainthearted? <S%H7390><s%> <S%H3824><s%> let him go <S%H1980><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> unto his house, <S%H1004><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> his brethren's <S%H251><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> faint <S%H4549><s%> as well as his heart. <S%H3824><s%>

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> when the officers <S%H7860><s%> have made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> that they shall make <S%H6485><s%> captains <S%H8269><s%> of the armies <S%H6635><s%> to lead <S%H7218><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou comest nigh <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it, then proclaim <S%H7121><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> it.

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> if <S%H518><s%> it make thee answer <S%H6030><s%> of peace, <S%H7965><s%> and open <S%H6605><s%> unto thee, then it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that is found <S%H4672><s%> therein shall be <S%H1961><s%> tributaries <S%H4522><s%> unto thee, and they shall serve <S%H5647><s%> thee.

And if <S%H518><s%> it will make no peace <S%H7999><s%> <S%H3808><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee, but will make <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> thee, then thou shalt besiege <S%H6696><s%> <S%H5921><s%> it:

And when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> it into thine hands, <S%H3027><s%> thou shalt smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2138><s%> thereof with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword: <S%H2719><s%>

But <S%H7535><s%> the women, <S%H802><s%> and the little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and the cattle, <S%H929><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> in the city, <S%H5892><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> thereof, shalt thou take <S%H962><s%> unto thyself; and thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of thine enemies, <S%H341><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee.

Thus <S%H3651><s%> shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> which are very <S%H3966><s%> far off <S%H7350><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee, which <S%H834><s%> are not <S%H3808><s%> of the cities <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>

But <S%H7535><s%> of the cities <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> doth give <S%H5414><s%> thee for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> thou shalt save alive <S%H2421><s%> nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that breatheth: <S%H5397><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt utterly destroy <S%H2763><s%> <S%H2763><s%> them; namely, the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusites; <S%H2983><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee:

That <S%H4616><s%> <S%H834><s%> they teach <S%H3925><s%> you not <S%H3808><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> after all <S%H3605><s%> their abominations, <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have done <S%H6213><s%> unto their gods; <S%H430><s%> so should ye sin <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt besiege <S%H6696><s%> <S%H413><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time, <S%H3117><s%> in making war <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it to take <S%H8610><s%> it, thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> thereof by forcing <S%H5080><s%> an axe <S%H1631><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them: for <S%H3588><s%> thou mayest eat <S%H398><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them, and thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> cut them down <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> (for <S%H3588><s%> the tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> is man's <S%H120><s%> life) to employ <S%H935><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them in the siege: <S%H4692><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1931><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> for meat, <S%H3978><s%> thou shalt destroy <S%H7843><s%> and cut them down; <S%H3772><s%> and thou shalt build <S%H1129><s%> bulwarks <S%H4692><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> that <S%H834><s%> <S%H1931><s%> maketh <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee, until <S%H5704><s%> it be subdued. <S%H3381><s%>
